did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two packages of condoms accompanied by four pages of advertising, printed out from the company's Web site.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two packages of condoms, named for the 2008 U.S. presidential candidates: one for McCain condoms ("Old but not expired") and one for Obama condoms ("Use with good judgement"). Accompanied by four pages of advertising for the condoms, printed out from the company's Web site.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Practice Safe Policy political condoms, #7751. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
